duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop designs of marine vessels and floating structures, such as ships, barges, tugs, etc.
Perform calculations necessary to assist in the design and fabrication of marine vessels.
Provide technical support to designers and draftsmen for development of technical packages.
Familiarity with ABS, CFR, USCG, SOLAS, IMO and other applicable regulations.
Experience with AutoCAD, Navisworks, Rhino 3D, Solidworks, Inventor, and Pipe-FLO software.
Self-starter with the ability to multitask and work within a fast-paced environment.

education_certification.credential: B.S. degree in Marine Engineering or B.S. degree in Mechanical Engineering with 5+ years in marine vessel design.
